article_node.title: Tariff Legal Battle Continues as China, India, Russia Tighten Ties
article_node.summary: The Bloomberg Businessweek Daily episode focuses on the legal uncertainty surrounding President Trump’s tariff policy after an appeals court ruled the tariffs illegal, with potential Supreme Court review. The discussion highlights how the ruling could affect trade relationships, especially with China, Russia, and India, and examines the broader impact on U.S. trade policy and market sentiment. Meanwhile, analysts touch on corporate news such as Kraft Heinz’s planned breakup and broader market movements, underscoring the interconnectedness of policy, trade, and corporate strategy.
